entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
